info.name: Integration Development Guide
info.description:
This collection contains examples from the Integration Development Guide of Acumatica ERP.

**Testing the Requests**

To test the examples, you configure this collection and the Acumatica ERP instance to be used as follows:

 - Deploy a new Acumatica ERP instance with the U100 dataset. For details on deploying an instance, see [To Deploy an Acumatica ERP Instance](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=b18ad378-0a8c-44f1-a14c-6b4f9c6271e4) in the Installation Guide.
 - Specify the URL of the instance in the BaseURL variable of the collection. The EndpointURL variable uses the value from the BaseURL variable and specifies the URL of the Default/20.200.001 endpoint. You do not need to change this variable until you want to use another endpoint.
 - To sign in to the instance in the client application, use the tenant name (which you specified when you created the instance) and the HEADOFFICE branch.

item.name: Working with the Contract-Based REST API
Signing in to the Service

request.description: This example shows how to sign in to Acumatica ERP. This process is described in [Sign-In to the Service](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=0322492a-de9b-4443-b256-923c48aff31d).

response.name: Signing in to the Service

item.name: Signing out from the Service

request.description: This example shows how to sign out from Acumatica ERP. This process is described in [Sign-Out from the Service](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=f6701ec1-2296-4155-8242-03d29006bf6e).

response.name: Signing out from the Service

item.name: Change of the Business Date or Current Branch

request.description: This example shows how to set the active branch and business date for a request. This process is described in [Change of the Business Date or Current Branch](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=9821cff9-4970-4153-a0f8-dbf5758133a7).

response.name: Change of the Business Date or Current Branch

item.name: Creation of a Record

request.description: This example shows the creation of a record, which is described in [Creation of a Record](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=9d966d50-a0a1-4456-a9ff-1cc2159d48d4).

response.name: Creation of a Record

item.name: Update of a Record

request.description: This example shows the update of a record, which is described in [Update of a Record](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=af48c02a-afbc-4fdb-b1e5-635ac7ebbaf1).

response.name: Update of a Record

item.name: Retrieval of a Record by Key Fields

request.description: This example shows the retrieval of a record by the values of its key fields, which is described in [Retrieval of a Record by Key Fields](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=52c97a83-1fa1-40e9-8219-52a89a91f2da).

response.name: Retrieval of a Record by Key Fields

item.name: Retrieval of a Record by ID

request.description: This example shows the retrieval of a record by the value of the entity ID, which is described in [Retrieval of a Record by ID](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=bc9531b0-717b-4b2d-8899-ff7ca805ade1).

response.name: Retrieval of a Record by ID

item.name: Retrieval of Records by Conditions

request.description: This example shows the retrieval of records that satisfy the specified conditions, which is described in [Retrieval of Records by Conditions](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=775ca16b-cba6-4c1d-89d5-c1df7833bfea).

response.name: Retrieval of Records by Conditions

item.name: Retrieval of Data from an Inquiry Form

request.description: This example shows the retrieval of data from an inquiry form, which is described in [Retrieval of Data from an Inquiry Form](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=6340cff3-4732-4231-9e42-5d1e5e65b5dd).

response.name: Retrieval of Data from an Inquiry Form

item.name: Retrieval of Records with Attributes

request.description: This example shows how to get leads together with their attributes. This process is described in [Retrieval of Records with Attributes](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=56831ee7-14b0-45ef-8207-dace30beb2cb).

response.name: Retrieval of Records with Attributes

item.name: Retrieval of User-Defined Fields

request.description:
This example illustrates the use of the $custom parameter, which is described in [Parameters for Retrieving Data](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=c5e2f36a-0971-4b33-b127-3c3fe14106ff).

To test this example, you need to add a user-defined field for the ORGSIZE attribute on the Sales Orders (SO301000) form and specify its value for the 000029 sales order.

For details about how to add a user-defined field, see [To Add User-Defined Fields to a Form](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=810b4857-2ffe-4764-aebf-4d657334f0be).

response.name: Retrieval of User-Defined Fields

item.name: Removal of a Record by Key Fields

request.description: This example shows the removal of a record by key fields, which is described in [Removal of a Record](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=d806636f-3cb8-4fd6-bc1e-fef9cdf9683d).

response.name: Removal of a Record by Key Fields

item.name: Execution of an Action

request.description: This example shows the re-opening of a sales order, which is described in [Execution of an Action](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=91bf9106-062a-47a8-be1f-b48517a54324).

response.name: Execution of an Action

item.name: Execution of an Action: Retrieval of the Status of the Operation

request.description: This example shows the retrieval of the status of the release of a sales order invoice, which is described in [Execution of an Action](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=91bf9106-062a-47a8-be1f-b48517a54324).

response.name: Execution of an Action: Retrieval of the Status of the Operation

item.name: Attachment of a File to a Record

request.description: This example shows the attachment of a file to a record, which is described in [Attachment of a File to a Record](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=591def3d-5fe5-42c1-bb35-cfe5b4c77f6f).

response.name: Attachment of a File to a Record

item.name: Retrieval of the List of Attached Files of a Record

request.description: This example shows the retrieval of the list of attached files, which is described in [Retrieval of a File Attached to a Record](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=b1bc82ee-ae6b-442a-a369-863d98f14630).

response.name: Retrieval of the List of Attached Files of a Record

item.name: Retrieval of a File Attached to a Record

request.description: This example shows the retrieval of a particular file attached to a record, which is described in [Retrieval of a File Attached to a Record](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=b1bc82ee-ae6b-442a-a369-863d98f14630).

response.name: Retrieval of a File Attached to a Record

item.name: Retrieval of the Acumatica ERP Version and the List of Endpoints

request.description: This example obtains the Acumatica ERP version and the list of contract-based endpoints available in this version by using the REST API. This example is described in [Retrieval of the Acumatica ERP Version and the List of Endpoints](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=da0fe495-b2e5-4d34-ab5a-5829e408f684).

item.description: This folder contains examples from the [Working with the Contract-Based REST API](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=1c767ad9-da6d-4047-bc93-6970ad469504) chapter of the Integration Development Guide.

item.name: Contract-Based API Examples
Inventory and Order Management
Creation of a Purchase Order and Purchase Receipt 1: Creation of a Purchase Order

request.description: This example shows how to create a purchase order. This process is described in [Creation of a Purchase Order and Purchase Receipt](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=81e5ec25-09f7-421a-8f80-01b6b71d38c9).

response.name: Creation of a Purchase Order and Purchase Receipt 1: Creation of a Purchase Order

item.name: Creation of a Purchase Order and Purchase Receipt 2: Update of a Purchase Order

request.description: This example shows how to release a purchase order from hold. This process is described in [Creation of a Purchase Order and Purchase Receipt](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=81e5ec25-09f7-421a-8f80-01b6b71d38c9).

response.name: Creation of a Purchase Order and Purchase Receipt 2: Update of a Purchase Order

item.name: Creation of a Purchase Order and Purchase Receipt 3: Creation of a Purchase Receipt

request.description: This example shows how to create a purchase receipt from a purchase order. This process is described in [Creation of a Purchase Order and Purchase Receipt](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=81e5ec25-09f7-421a-8f80-01b6b71d38c9).

response.name: Creation of a Purchase Order and Purchase Receipt 3: Creation of a Purchase Receipt

item.name: Creation of a Bill for Particular Lines of a Purchase Order

request.description: This example shows how to create an AP bill for a particular line of a purchase order in Acumatica ERP. This process is described in [Creation of a Bill for Particular Lines of a Purchase Order or Receipt](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=a1116acb-66aa-4415-8148-5bbab45b0a50).

This process is described in [Creation of a Bill for Particular Lines of a Purchase Order or Receipt](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=a1116acb-66aa-4415-8148-5bbab45b0a50).

response.name: Creation of a Bill for Particular Lines of a Purchase Receipt
